attributes.action: Risk of closure of Wellspring Surgery, St Anns, Nottingham
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned, are concerned patients who urge our local MP to act now to ensure that our GP services remain in St Anns.
attributes.background:
Risk of closure of Wellspring Surgery, St Anns, Nottingham 
refer to patient letter on surgery website .wellspringsurgerynottingham.co.uk

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Decisions about local health services are usually the responsibility of local NHS bodies, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you would like to contact your MP about this issue, you can find their contact details here:

http://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
